title: I sit here so angry at this game.
body:
It's not even the game's fault. I'm just tired of dealing with people. People make mistakes. People make great plays. People are toxic. People are pleasant. People help. People don't.

I'm just tired of it all. I'm tired of people. I just want some consistency in this game. There is none. I win, I climb, I get bad teammates. I lose. I fall. I get bad teammates. I win one, get good teammates. I win another, get bad teammates. I win a string of games and get good teammates. Lose one game, get bad teammates. Such an inconsistent system. 
{{sticker:darius-angry}} 

Anywho, how is everyone?
